item.title: CDK Demo - Getting Started
item.description: what is cdk? The Cloud Development Toolkit allows you to generate (in their terms, synthesise) cloudformation templates using other languages such as Typescript, Java or Python. Using predefined constructs, we can, at a high level, define complicated infrastructure using very little code and let cdk generate the cloudformation template. prerequisites Before we can proceed with installing and using CDK, we must first satisfy the following requirements AWS CLI installed and configured with valid credentials node.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I have been working in IT for several years now and have worked in many different roles, most recently as a ‘cloud engineer.’ The aim of this blog is to provide information, tutorials and guidance on cloud computing, IT, and tech in general. Please feel free to contact me via twitter if you have anything you would like to discuss.
